p: In what follows, we highlight results for select (mostly populous) countries that are of broad geographic representation and characterized by diverse demographic structures. These include Brazil, China, Egypt, India, Indonesia, Italy, Niger, Pakistan, and USA. Estimates and uncertainty ranges for these countries are illustrated in Figs 1, 3 and 4. Detailed results for all 159 countries and territories are in S3-S8 Tables in S1 File.
